001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import java.io.*;
004
005/**
006 * This program subtracts some number of points off of each student's
007 * grade for a given project.  It is used when I forget to take the
008 * POA into account when grading.
009 */
010public class AdjustProjectGrade {
011  private static PrintStream err = System.err;
012  
013  /**
014   * Prints usage information about this program
015   */
016  private static void usage(String s) {
017    err.println("\n** " + s + "\n");
018    err.println("usage: java AdjustProjectGrade xmlFile proj points");
019    err.println("  xmlFile  XML file containing the grade book");
020    err.println("  proj     The project from which to deduct points");
021    err.println("  points   The number of points to deduct");
022    err.println("");
023    err.println("This program deducts a number of points off of " +
024                "each students grade for a given project.");
025    err.println("");
026    System.exit(1);
027  }
028
029  public static void main(String[] args) throws Throwable {
030    String fileName = null;
031    String proj = null;
032    String pointsString = null;
033
034    for (String arg : args) {
035      if (fileName == null) {
036        fileName = arg;
037
038      } else if (proj == null) {
039        proj = arg;
040
041      } else if (pointsString == null) {
042        pointsString = arg;
043
044      } else {
045        usage("Spurious command line: " + arg);
046      }
047    }
048
049    if (fileName == null) {
050      usage("Missing file name");
051      return;
052    }
053
054    if (proj == null) {
055      usage("Missing project");
056    }
057
058    if (pointsString == null) {
059      usage("Missing points");
060    }
061
062    double points;
063    try {
064      points = Double.parseDouble(pointsString);
065
066    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
067      usage("Invalid points: " + pointsString);
068      return;
069    }
070
071    File file = new File(fileName);
072    if (!file.exists()) {
073      usage("File \"" + file + "\" does not exist");
074    }
075
076    XmlGradeBookParser parser = new XmlGradeBookParser(file);
077    GradeBook book = parser.parse();
078    
079    Assignment assign = book.getAssignment(proj);
080    if (assign == null) {
081      usage("No such assignment: " + proj);
082      return;
083    }
084
085    if (assign.getType() != Assignment.AssignmentType.PROJECT) {
086      usage("Assignment \"" + proj + "\" is not a project");
087    }
088
089    adjustGradeForEachStudent(book, proj, points);
090
091    XmlDumper dumper = new XmlDumper(file);
092    dumper.dump(book);
093  }
094
095  private static void adjustGradeForEachStudent(GradeBook book, String projectName, double adjustment) {
096    book.forEachStudent((Student student) -> {
097      Grade grade = student.getGrade(projectName);
098      if (grade != null) {
099        grade.setScore(grade.getScore() - adjustment);
100      }
101    });
102  }
103
104}
